badges.description:
Badges are difficult to get awards that were created to reward those who have most supported the development of the bot. The badge list is available in the bot guide.
(via this link: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-avancees/badges)
badges.title: {emote:commands.badges} Detailed information:

guild.islandInfo: {emote:guild.isOnPveIsland} Number of members on the mysterious island: {{membersOnPveIsland}}

guildCreate.title: {{pseudo}}, creating a guild
guildCreate.canceledDesc: Your guild creation has been cancelled.
guildCreate.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.question} Confirm the creation of the **{{guildName}}** guild for `{{price}}` {emote:unitValues.money}?
guildCreate.acceptedFooter: Caution: the staff reserves the right to rename your guild.

guildInvite.title: {{pseudo}}, you were invited to join a guild!
guildInvite.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.question} Would you like to join the {{guildName}} guild?
guildInvite.successDesc: The delay before the next guild daily reward has been reset.

errors.guildIsFull: Your guild is full and cannot welcome more members.
errors.playerIsAlreadyInAGuild: This player already belongs to a guild.
errors.playerIsOnPveIsland: {{pseudo}} cannot join the guild as it is currently on a boat or in a mystery island. {{pseudo}} must be located in the main continent in order to join a guild.

guildKick.title: Kick from a guild
guildKick.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.question} Are you sure you want to expel {{kickedPseudo}} from the {{guildName}} guild?
guildKick.acceptedDesc: {{kickedPseudo}} has been expelled from the guild!
guildKick.canceledDesc: {{kickedPseudo}} was not kicked from the guild!
guildKick.noPlayer: The player is not in the guild.
guildKick.notSameGuild: You cannot kick a player who is not in your guild.
guildKick.himself: You cannot kick yourself from the guild.
guildKick.blocked: The player you are trying to expel is currently blocked. Please wait a while before trying again.

guildElder.notSameGuild: This player does not belong to your guild.
guildElder.notChiefError: You must be the leader of the guild to perform this order.
guildElder.chiefError: As the leader of the guild, you may not be able to be the elder.
guildElder.alreadyElder: The player is already in your guild.
guildElder.title: {{pseudo}}, do you confirm your choice?
guildElder.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.question} {{elderPseudo}} will become the elder of the `{{guildName}}` guild.
guildElder.successElderAddTitle: {{elderPseudo}} is the new elder of the {{guildName}} guild!
guildElder.acceptedDesc: The elder assits the leader in the management of the guild. You must therefore choose it with caution. But rest assured, if you were not satisfied with your elder, you can replace it with the {command:guildelder} command, or if you have a dictator's mindset, you can definitively remove it with {command:guildelderremove}.
guildElder.canceledDesc: The player has not been promoted as an elder.

guildLeave.title: {{pseudo}}, confirmation:
guildLeave.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.question} Do you really want to leave the {{guildName}} guild?
guildLeave.confirmChiefDesc: {emote:collectors.question} Do you really want to **destroy** the {{guildName}} guild for good?
guildLeave.confirmChiefDescWithElder: {emote:collectors.question} Do you really want to leave the {{guildName}} guild? {{newChiefPseudo}} will become its leader.
guildLeave.leavingSuccess: You are a poor lonely cowboy and you are far away from home...
guildLeave.newChiefTitle: {{newChiefPseudo}} is the new leader of the {{guildName}} guild!
guildLeave.notInAGuild: It would appear that you are no longer part of a guild.

guildElderRemove.noElder: The guild does not have an elder.
guildElderRemove.notSameGuild: This player does not belong to your guild.
guildElderRemove.notChiefError: You must be the leader of the guild to use this command.
guildElderRemove.chiefError: As a guild leader, you cannot be downgraded to an elder.
guildElderRemove.notElder: The player is not your guild's elder.
guildElderRemove.title: {{pseudo}}, do you confirm your choice?
guildElderRemove.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.question} {{elderPseudo}} will become a simple member of the `{{guildName}}` guild.

guildDescription.title: {{pseudo}}, do you confirm your choice?
guildDescription.confirmDesc:
{emote:collectors.question}  Do you really want to change your guild description?
 New description: {{description}}.
guildDescription.acceptedDesc: The guild's description has been successfully edited!
guildDescription.canceledDesc: You did not edit the guild's description!
guildDescription.noGuild: Looks like you are no longer in a guild.
guildDescription.notAnElder: You no longer have permission to use this command.

BADGES.description:
Badges are rewards that are very hard to get, created to honor people who helped in the bot's development. The list of badges is available on the bot guide.
 Available by this link: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-avancees/badges

CLASSES.description: Change your class. More information about class is available through the player guide: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en

CLASSES_INFO.description: Reads a quick comparison of statistics and class information available to the user using the command.

DAILY_BONUS.description: Some items give you a daily bonus. Use this command to obtain said bonuses. You can learn if an item gives you a daily bonus by using the command {command:inventory}.

DRINK.description: This command allows you to drink the potion you have. Some potions cannot be drunk and are consumed automatically during a fight.

FIGHT.description:
Use this command to challenge other players on the same server as you.
Battles take place on a turn-by-turn basis. Each turn, you can choose an action to perform.

For more information, please visit the guide page: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-principale/combats

GLORY_TOP.description: Displays the ranking of the fights in 15 player intervals. Player's league is also displayed. Players in the same server as you are shown by a blue dot.

GUILD_CREATE.description: Create a guild. You need 5000 {emote:unitValues.money} in order to create a guild.

GUILD_DESCRIPTION.description: Edit the description of your guild. Requires to be the guild's leader.

GUILD_ELDER.description: Allows one to designate a guild elder, requires to be guild's leader.

GUILD_ELDER_REMOVE.description: Allow to remove the current guild's elder, requires to be guild's leader.

GUILD_INVITE.description: Invites someone to join your guild. Requires to be the guild's leader or elder.

GUILD_KICK.description: Kicks a member. Requires to be the guild's leader.

GUILD_TOP.description: Displays guild rankings in increments of 15 guilds. Guilds are ranked according to points collected on mysterious islands.

IDEA.description: Give a link to submit suggestions and vote for those already submitted.

INVENTORY.description:
Shows the items in your inventory, can contain 4 types of objects:
```
-weapons
-armors
-potions
-items
```
The command also shows the items stock that can contain additional items.

INVITE_DRAFTBOT.description: This command allows you to get an invitation link to join the support server!

JOIN_BOAT.description: Join a guild member on a boat bound for a mysterious island.

LANGUAGE.description:
Choose the language to be used for your interactions with the bot from 6 available languages:

- French
- English
- Spanish
- German
- Italian
- Portuguese

LEAGUE_BONUS.description: Lets you claim your league's reward each Sunday.

MAP.description: Display information about your destination, and also the map.

MISSIONS.description: Displays the list of missions assigned to you.

NOTIFICATIONS.description: Allows you to set up the reception of bot notifications. You can choose to receive notifications (and determine where to display them) for reports and/or guild rewards.

PET_FEED.description: Give some food to your pet.

PET_FREE.description: Free your pet. Be careful, once it has been freed, it will be deleted forever and therefore cannot be restored. This command can only be made once per hour.

PET_NICKNAME.description: Change your pet's nickname. If no name is given, the nickname will be cleared.

PET_SELL.description:
Allows to sell a pet. The following conditions apply: 
 - The selling price must be higher than `{{petSellMinPrice}}{emote:unitValues.money}` and lower than `{{petSellMaxPrice}}{emote:unitValues.money}`. 
- The seller will not earn money for the transaction, but guild experience. 
- The seller and the buyer cannot be part of the same guild.

PET_TRANSFER.description: Allows you to transfer a pet to or from the guild. You'll have the choice of dropping the pet you're with into the shelter, swapping it with another, or removing one from the shelter.

PING.description:
Check if the bot is online.

(Note: Time displayed is the response time from the bot, not your ping, a correct ping should be less than 500 ms. {emote:clock.1})

PROFILE.description:
Displays information about your character:

{emote:effects.none} Health status | Nickname | Level

឵឵Information :
{emote:unitValues.health} Life | {emote:unitValues.xp} XP | {emote:unitValues.money}

Money Statistics:
{emote:unitValues.energy} Energy | {emote:unitValues.attack} Attack | {emote:unitValues.defense} {emote:unitValues.speed} Defense | {emote:unitValues.breath} Breath | {emote:unitValues.breathRegen} Recovery

Missions:
{emote:unitValues.gem} Gems | {emote:missions.campaign} Campaign progress in %

Rank and score :
{emote:top.congrats} Rank | {emote:unitValues.score} Score

Class:
See {command:classes}

Glory and League:
{emote:unitValues.glory} Glory | See {command:top glory}

Guild:
{emote:other.guild} Guild

Destination:
See {command:map}

Familiar:
See {command:pet}

{emote:other.advice}-Badges are displayed on your profile as reactions.

RARITY.description: Allows you to see the probability of getting an item by its rarity.

REPORT.description:
Lets you obtain the resources and intel your character got during your absence.
From time to time, events will be triggered and will necessitate special actions or choices.

RESPAWN.description: Lets you restart playing after you've been knocked out.

SELL.description: Lets you sell the item currently in your reserve. The value of the item is set to be equal to its power. Potions have no resale value, but may be thrown away with this command.

SHOP.description: This command allows you to spend your money to facilitate your adventure. Besides the 4 main choices which are always available, you can buy an exclusive potion every day, available on sale for only 24h.

SWITCH.description: Exchanges a piece of equipment from your stockpile with what you currently own, provided it is of the same category. If no equipment in the category of the item to be equipped is owned before the order is executed, it will simply move it into the inventory.

TOP.description: Displays the general ranking of the game in 15 player intervals. Players in the same server as you are shown by a blue dot.

UNLOCK.description: Allows you to pay a bail to set someone free.

VOTE.description: Allows you to get the link to vote for the bot.

help.helpEmbedDescription: {emote:messages.item} If you want more information about a particular order, click here: {command:help}, and give the command you are having problems with in parameters. {emote:other.wink}
help.helpEmbedTitle: {{pseudo}}, here is the list of available commands:
help.needHelpDescription:
{emote:fightCommand.crossedSwords} Hello ! This message has been sent in response to a request for help.

If you need any help with the game, you can join the bot's official server!

You'll be able to take part in the game's development and get all the information you need!

We also recommend that you consult the detailed bot guide: https://guide.draftbot.com/

idea.description:
You can submit suggestions and vote for your favorites via this link:
https://feedback.draftbot.com/
idea.title: {emote:other.advice} Ideas

inventory.noSlot: {emote:messages.refuse} No slot available. Buy slots in the shop!
inventory.title: {emote:commands.inventory} **{{pseudo}}'s inventory**
inventory.randomItemFooter: You already have an equipment, would you like to sell it?
inventory.randomItemFooterPotion: Would you like to destroy your current potion?

discord.main: Join the community! Use this link: https://discord.gg/acGNvzEY92 {emote:effects.none}

language.description: Use the menu below to change the language used by the bot. This change will only apply to you.
language.newLanguageSetDescription: DraftBot will now speak in English with you ! {emote:languageFlavors.en}
language.title: {emote:commands.language} Language selection

discord.edit:
:ping_pong: Pong

**Total latency:** {{totalLatency}} ms
**Discord latency:** {{discordApiLatency}} ms
**Shard number:** {{shardId}}
**Total shards:** {{totalShards}} (+main shard)

badgeDisplay.numberBadge_one: This player has a total of {{count}} badges!
badgeDisplay.numberBadge_other: This player has a total of {{count}} badges!
badgeDisplay.title: List of {{pseudo}}'s badges

badges.first_20_members: One of the 20 first members of the bot's server
badges.top_glory: Person who has won the most glory during a fighting season
badges.support: Person who has the Support role on the bot's server
badges.advertiser: Person who helped put the bot on a server with over 2000 members
badges.contest: Badge winnable from time to time in contests on the bot's server or on Twitter
badges.christmas: Badge winnable each Christmas in a contest
badges.top_week: Person who dominated a weekly ranking
badges.random: Badge given in a completely random way
badges.top_10_v1: Player in top 10 before the 1.0 reset
badges.top_v1_player: Best player by rank at the 1.0 reset
badges.mission_completer: Badge purchased in the missions shop
badges.legendary_pet: Player who trained a legendary pet
badges.good_bug_reporter: Person who reported an exploitable bug without taking advantage of it
badges.voter: Person who voted in the last 12 hours
badges.funny: Badge given to a funny person
badges.top_1_before_reset: Person who has reached the top of the ranking after the reset
badges.very_powerful_guild: Member of a very powerful guild

rarity.earlyAvailable: Owned at the start of the game
rarity.title: {emote:commands.rarity} Equipment rarity

report.chooseDestinationIndications: Choose the destination of your travel:
report.choseMapMinutes_one: You chose to go in the direction {{mapPrefix}} {{mapEmote}} **{{mapName}}** {{mapType}}. You'll travel for about **{{time}} minute**.
report.choseMapMinutes_other: You chose to go in the direction {{mapPrefix}} {{mapEmote}} **{{mapName}}** {{mapType}}. You'll travel for about **{{time}} minutes**.
report.choseMap_one: You chose to go in the direction {{mapPrefix}} {{mapEmote}} **{{mapName}}** {{mapType}}. You'll travel for about **{{time}} hour**.
report.choseMap_other: You chose to go in the direction {{mapPrefix}} {{mapEmote}} **{{mapName}}** {{mapType}}. You'll travel for about **{{time}} hours**.
report.commandDescription: Get a report on your character's situation.
report.doEvent:
{emote:commands.report} **{{pseudo}}'s log:** {{event}}
*- Use the buttons to perform an action {emote:collectors.warning} Not answering is considered a separate choice.*
encounterMonster: You arrive at your destination when suddenly, you hear a noise behind you... A monster attacks you!
report.noFight: {emote:commands.report} **{{pseudo}}'s log:** {emote:pveFights.waitABit} | You make a quick getaway and find a little hiding place! The monster is waiting patiently outside...
report.pveFightRefused: {emote:commands.report} **{{pseudo}}'s log:** {emote:pveFights.waitABit} | You decide not to engage in combat for the time being, and take refuge in a nearby hiding place. You'll have to face the beast eventually, as you can find no other way out.
report.travellingDescription: Everything is going well since your last adventure {{smallEventEmoji}}. Next stop scheduled {{time}}.
report.travellingDescriptionEndTravel: Everything is going well for you. You will reach your destination shortly.
report.travellingDescriptionWithoutSmallEvent: Everything is going well for you. Next stop scheduled {{time}}.

update.description:
The latest version of the bot's core is **{{coreVersion}}**. The Discord module's version is **{{discordModuleVersion}}**.

Information about the changelog can be found here:
https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/lore/change-logs
update.title: {emote:messages.description} Changelog

vote.description:
Here is the link to support the bot:
https://top.gg/bot/448110812801007618
vote.title: {emote:commands.vote} Vote

description.ongoing:
You are currently going in the direction {{particle}} **{{emote}} {{destination}}**.
> {{description}}

petFree.title: {{pseudo}}, pet release
petFree.canceledDesc: The pet has not been released.
petFree.confirmDesc: {emote:collectors.warning} Are you sure you want to release **{{pet}}**? It is not possible to undo once the action has been done.

petNick.successNoName: Your pet no longer has a nickname!

shop.noAlterationToHeal: You have not been affected by any state alteration. {emote:effects.none}
shop.healAlteration: {emote:shopItems.healAlteration} Your state changes have been deleted.
shop.tooManyEnergyBought: You purchased the maximum energy recovery amount for this week.
shop.noEnergyToHeal: You have all your combat energy. {emote:unitValues.energy}
shop.badgeBought: You have received a new badge: {emote:badges.{{badgeName}}}!
shop.notEnoughMoney: You don't have enough money to buy this item! You are missing `{{missingCurrency}} {emote:unitValues.{{currency}}}`.
shop.boughtTooMuchDailyPotions: There are no more potions available for sale... Come back tomorrow!
shop.title: {emote:commands.shop} Store Display
shop.buyCategorySlotSuccess: You bought a new inventory slot!
shop.shopConfirmationTitleMultiple: {{pseudo}}, select a quantity for this item:
shop.chooseSlotIndication: Choose a new inventory slot or cancel:

randomItem.name: {emote:shopItems.randomItem} Random equipment
randomItem.info: You will receive a random equipment (Weapon / Armour / Item or Potion) among all those available in-game.

alterationHeal.name: {emote:shopItems.healAlteration} Status healing
alterationHeal.info: Your state changes will be deleted and you will resume your route immediately.
alterationHeal.give: {emote:shopItems.healAlteration} Your state changes have been deleted.

energyHeal.name: {emote:shopItems.healEnergy} Energy recovery
energyHeal.info: Your combat energy will be fully restored.

fullRegen.name: {emote:shopItems.regen} Complete heal
fullRegen.info: You will be fully healed but your status will stay unchanged.

moneyMouthBadge.name: {emote:shopItems.moneyMouthBadge} "Money Mouth" Badge
moneyMouthBadge.info: You will receive the badge automatically after payment. For more information on badges, use the {command:help} command.

slotExtension.name: {emote:shopItems.inventoryExtension} New inventory slot
slotExtension.info: You can choose an inventory category to which to add a slot.

dailyPotion.info: You'll get a potion that you can decide whether to keep it or not. If you already have it, it will be thrown away without refund!

smallGuildXp.name: {emote:shopItems.smallGuildXp} A small amount of XP for your guild
smallGuildXp.info: You will receive a random amount of guild XP between 50 and 450.

bigGuildXp.name: {emote:shopItems.bigGuildXp} A large amount of XP for your guild
bigGuildXp.info: You will receive a random amount of guild XP between 750 and 6750.

commonFood.name: {emote:foods.commonFood} Treat
commonFood.info: You will receive a treat for your pets.

herbivorousFood.name: {emote:foods.herbivorousFood} Salad
herbivorousFood.info: You will receive salad for your pets.

carnivorousFood.name: {emote:foods.carnivorousFood} Meat
carnivorousFood.info: You will receive meat for your pets.

ultimateFood.name: {emote:foods.ultimateFood} Ultimate soup
ultimateFood.info: You will receive an ultimate soup for your pets.

skipMission.name: {emote:shopItems.skipMission} Mission change
skipMission.info: Allows you to delete a mission obtained on the map and exchange it for a new mission. However, you will not have the choice of the chosen mission.
skipMission.giveTitle: {{pseudo}}, you decided to change a mission

money.name: {emote:unitValues.money} King's money
money.info: From the gem day course and after the King's tax reduction, you will receive `{{kingsMoneyAmount}}` {emote:unitValues.money}.

treasure.name: {emote:shopItems.treasure} King's treasure
treasure.info: Gives you a valuable item from the king's treasure room.

kingsFavor.name: {emote:unitValues.score} King's fervor
kingsFavor.info: Grants you {{thousandPoints}} points. Can only be used once per week.
kingsFavor.giveDescription: You got {{thousandPoints}} {emote:unitValues.score}. See you next week for a new fervor!

lovePointsValue.name: {emote:shopItems.lovePointsValue} Court veterinary
lovePointsValue.info: Get detailed information about your pet.

bite: This pet has impressive fangs! In combat, it won't hesitate to bite your opponents with fearsome precision.
Look at those canines! Your companion can bite your enemies, inflicting painful wounds and throwing them off balance.
Its teeth are perfect for fighting. It'll hurt your opponents by biting them at strategic points!
boostDefense: Its carapace is extraordinarily resistant! In combat, it will position itself in front of you like a living shield, considerably increasing your defense.
I can see a remarkable defensive muscular structure. Your pet will protect you by absorbing some damage for you.
This specimen has a strong protective instinct. It will create a natural barrier around you during confrontations.
boostSpeed: It's built for speed! In combat, it can carry you on its back, increasing your agility on the battlefield tenfold.
Its reflexes are exceptional. It'll share his incredible alertness with you in battle, making you that much faster.
This pet has special glands that secrete an acceleration hormone. By your side, you'll be moving like lightning!
claws: Your pet's claws are sharper than many blades! It'll use them to slash your enemies with terrifying efficiency.
The keratinized structure of its claws is unique. In combat, it can inflict deep cuts on your opponents.
I observe a perfect retraction mechanism. It'll save his sharp claws for critical moments, surprising your enemies.
createBomb: This pet has amazing explosive glands! It can create small biological bombs, which it deposits strategically near your opponents.
Its metabolism enables it to synthesize unstable compounds. It will manufacture natural explosives to give you the edge in combat.
Fascinating! Its chemical secretions can form explosive charges. Your enemies will see nothing but fire... literally!
buildBarrage: Its building instinct is impressive! It'll erect protective barricades to isolate you from enemy attacks.
This species is renowned for its architectural abilities. Your pet will quickly build defensive structures in the midst of battle.
Its legs are perfectly suited to building barricades. They'll give you effective protection against your opponents.
elephantRememberLastAction: Its memory is phenomenal! This pet will remember your opponents' tactics and help you anticipate their next moves.
Its brain is remarkably well-developed. It will memorize previous actions to advise you on the best strategy to adopt.
Like all his kind, it never forgets. This prodigious memory will enable you to perfectly adapt your actions in combat.
fishProtectAgainstFire: Its skin secretes an extraordinary fire-retardant mucus! It provides effective protection against fire attacks in combat.
This aquatic specimen features a unique thermal regulation system. Thanks to it, you'll be much more resistant to enemy flames.
This pet's scales contain anti-inflammatory properties. It will wrap you in its protection against burns.
goesWild: Beware, this pet has a savage temperament! In combat, it can go into a destructive rage, striking at all nearby opponents.
Its primitive instinct can be awakened at any moment. This natural fury will be formidable against your enemies, but be careful!
I detect the potential for extraordinary frenzy. Your pet can unleash its wild nature against your opponents.
healEveryone: This pet has remarkable healing powers! It can heal your wounds and those of your allies in the midst of battle.
Its secretions contain powerful regenerating enzymes. It'll use them to keep you in shape during confrontations.
I observe unique bio-regenerative properties in its body. Your pet will share this vital energy with you and your companions.
helpBreathe: Its breathing capacity is extraordinary! It can share its oxygen with you during tough battles or underwater.
This specimen has fascinating modified gills. It will help you catch your breath in critical moments.
Its highly evolved pulmonary system enables it to store oxygen. It'll transfer it to you when you'll run out of breath.
horn: This horn is a formidable natural weapon! Your pet will use it to impale your opponents with impressive force.
The keratinized structure of its horn is harder than steel. It will charge your enemies, inflicting considerable damage.
This specimen has a perfectly balanced horn for combat. It will target your opponents' weak points.
hypnosis: Its eyes possess a fascinating hypnotic power! It can disorientate your opponents, leaving them confused and vulnerable.
This pet masters natural psychic techniques. It will confuse your enemies' minds during combat.
The patterns on its skin create a unique hypnotic effect. Your opponents will be disoriented, unable to concentrate on their attacks.
isUseless: Uh... this pet has a... contemplative temperament. In combat, it will observe the situation with philosophical detachment.
I have to be honest: its fighting skills are limited. It'll accompany you morally, without really intervening.
This specimen belongs to a pacifist species. Its presence will be... spiritually enriching during your battles.
meduseParalyze: Its tentacles contain a powerful paralyzing venom! It can immobilize your opponents, rendering them temporarily harmless.
This pet secretes a remarkable neurotoxin. A simple sting and your enemies will be paralyzed on the spot.
Its unique biochemistry enables it to produce paralyzing agents. Your opponents will be frozen, unable to retaliate.
peck: Your pet's beak is as sharp as a dagger! It will help it harass your opponents with precise, painful blows during a fight.
The bone structure of its beak is perfectly suited to striking. It will sting your enemies at sensitive points with precision.
This pet has mastered the art of being annoying with its beak. Your opponents will be weakened by its relentless attacks.
petCharge: Its muscular frame is designed for charging! In combat, it will launch itself at your opponents with devastating force.
This specimen has a reinforced bone structure perfect for impact. It'll knock your enemies over like bowling pins.
Its charging instinct is impressive. It'll gather momentum to smash into your opponents with unprecedented power.
petCurse: This pet possesses disturbing mystical abilities! It can curse your opponents, weakening their luck and willpower.
Its eyes shine with a supernatural glow that brings bad luck. Your enemies will suffer inexplicable setbacks after its intervention.
I observe unique thaumaturgical properties in its aura. It will cast powerful curses against your opponents.
petHit: Its protective instinct is remarkable! If you're hit, it'll strike back immediately to avenge you.
This pet is extremely loyal and responsive. It will strike back fiercely when you take damage in combat.
Its empathic connection with you is unique. Every blow you receive triggers its vengeful fury.
petPoison: Its toxic glands are perfectly developed! It will poison your opponents, gradually weakening them.
This specimen secretes a particularly virulent venom. Your enemies will slowly weaken after being infected.
Its saliva contains complex toxins. One touch and your opponents will see their strength diminish inexorably.
petSmallCharge: Despite its small size, this pet is very brave! It'll charge your opponents, creating an effective diversion.
Its compact size gives it surprising speed. It will hit your enemies at strategic moments.
This small specimen makes up for its size with determination. Its rapid charges will destabilize your opponents.
pinch: Its claws are particularly powerful! It'll use them to painfully squeeze the limbs of your opponents.
The pressure exerted by its claws can reach impressive values. Your enemies will wince in pain under their embrace.
This pet has mastered the art of tactical pinching. It will target your opponents' sensitive points with precision.
poisonousBite: Its fangs inject a sophisticated venom! Its bite will poison your opponents, weakening them considerably.
This specimen has hyperdeveloped venom glands. A simple bite and your enemies will suffer severe poisoning.
Analysis of its venom reveals unique neurotoxic compounds. Its bites are particularly devastating in combat.
protectAgainstCold: Its coat has exceptional insulating properties! It will protect you effectively against ice attacks.
Its body temperature is naturally high. By your side, you'll be perfectly equipped to withstand icy environments and cold spells.
This pet generates a remarkable thermal field. It'll envelop you in its protective warmth against cold attacks.
rainbowPower: This pet can channel the surrounding prismatic energy! It will convert recent magical attacks into healing for you.
Its iridescent scales absorb and transform ambient energy. After several exchanges of spells, it will reinvigorate you.
I'm observing a unique chromatic transmutation phenomenon. Your pet will recycle battle energy to heal you.
revenge: Its instinct for vengeance is impressive! When you're wounded, it automatically retaliates with tenfold violence.
This specimen has an impressive memory for wrongs. It won't forget who hit you, and will retaliate when the time is right.
Its loyalty manifests itself in a thirst for immediate justice. Every blow you receive will be returned a hundredfold by your pet.
scareElephant: The presence of your pet naturally intimidates elephants! They will flee the fight.
This pet emits pheromones that terrorize pachyderms. Big enemies will hesitate to attack you in its presence.
Your pet's cry is particularly disturbing for some animals. Elephants in particular will retreat.
scareFish: Its aura is terrifying for aquatic creatures! It will scare off fish and dolphins.
This specimen secretes a substance that alarms aquatic organisms. Most marine animals will avoid its territory.
Its silhouette is reminiscent of a natural ocean predator. Fish will retreat at the mere sight of it.
slipping: Its fur secretes a unique slippery substance! It propels itself like a living projectile against your opponents.
This pet masters the art of movement on smooth surfaces. It transforms into an organic missile, striking your enemies at high speed.
Its hydrodynamic body is perfect for gliding. It'll gather momentum to smash into your opponents like a living bowling ball.
smallClaws: Despite their modest size, their claws are remarkably sharp! They inflict precise, irritating scratches.
This little pet makes up for its size with its slender claws. It'll target your opponents' sensitive points.
Its tiny claws are perfect for harassing opponents. It'll distract your enemies with strategic scratches.
smallRegen: Its regenerative metabolism is contagious! It'll share his healing abilities with you in battle.
This specimen secretes healing enzymes. You'll benefit from them to speed up your recovery.
Its unique biochemistry stimulates cell regeneration. With it, your wounds will heal faster.
snowBall: This pet manipulates ice with astonishing dexterity! It'll create and throw very cold snowballs at your opponents.
Its ability to compress snow is remarkable. It will bombard your enemies with particularly compact icy projectiles.
Its body temperature allows him to shape ice at will. Your opponents will fall victim to an unexpected winter bombardment.
spit: Analysis reveals that its saliva contains natural irritant enzymes, making it an effective tool for visually obstructing opponents.
Its salivary secretion has an atypical chemical composition, capable of provoking local irritation in the enemy.
Veterinary observations confirm that its salivary glands release an acidic fluid that can temporarily impair the visual capacity of its opponents.
spitFire: Examinations indicate that its metabolic system produces a flammable substance, ideal for generating a controlled jet of flame.
Samples show a high concentration of pyrogenic compounds, enabling it to spit moderate flames in combat situations.
Veterinary analysis shows that its glands synthesize a combustible substance, offering a short-range fire-spraying attack.
spitInk: Tests have revealed that its glands contain opaque pigments, capable of temporarily obscuring the opponent's vision.
Chromatographic analysis shows that it secretes a dense ink, likely to disrupt the visual perception of enemies.
Laboratory observations indicate the production of high-viscosity ink, effectively serving to disorientate opponents during confrontations.
stealWeapon: Behavioral tests suggest that this pet has a remarkable ability to identify and seize metal objects belonging to the opponent.
Its weapon retrieval behavior is a testament to its fine agility, enabling it to extract the enemy's weapon in record time.
Behavioral analysis shows that his highly developed reflexes enable him to neutralize opposing offensive equipment effectively.
swallow: Clinical observations show that its digestive tract is capable of swallowing prey, thus neutralizing its adversary.
Its digestive capacity allows it to completely ingest the enemy, making it an interesting alternative defense method.
Anatomical studies reveal a particularly elastic throat, suitable for accommodating an opponent...
triesToHelp: Behavioral tests suggest that the pet tries to assist its master by providing measured help, although its contributions remain limited.
Clinical observations indicate partial reactivity, probably due to imperfect synchronization with the owner's behavior.
Behavioral analyses show a willingness to intervene, even if its efforts bring only marginal improvement in the field.
unBlind: Evaluations show that its high-performance visual system can restore its owner's vision by broadcasting stimulating signals.
Physiological measurements confirm that its ocular capacities are capable of dissipating the visual alterations suffered by the ally.
Veterinary observations indicate that he actively helps to restore his master's visual clarity through extended perception.
vampirism: Metabolic analyses show that this specimen can transfer a fraction of an opponent's vital energy, improving its owner's stamina.
Examinations confirm a natural energy absorption capacity, characterized by a subtle withdrawal of adverse energy.
Clinical observations show that it possesses energy transfer mechanisms capable of revitalizing its master by capturing hostile energy.

lovePointsValue.ageComment_ancestor: INCREDIBLE! Exclaims the wide-eyed vet. Your pet is an exceptionally rare specimen! It's one of the oldest ever recorded in our archives, with only {{age}} older pets ever found! A true living relic!
lovePointsValue.ageComment_veryOld: Fascinating! Murmurs the vet, adjusting his glasses. Your pet has reached a venerable age that few of its peers know. Our records show that only {{age}} pets have lived longer. His longevity is quite remarkable!
lovePointsValue.ageComment_old: Well, well, well! Your companion has already come a long way, notes the vet with a benevolent smile. With only {{age}} older pets in our archives, he has accumulated wisdom and experience over the years. He's a senior citizen in great shape!
lovePointsValue.ageComment_adult: Your pet is in the prime of life, observes the vet, shaking his head. Of all our patients, {{age}} has more years behind it. He has reached full maturity, combining vigor and balance. It's the ideal time!
lovePointsValue.ageComment_other: Your pet is still young, says the vet tenderly. {{age}} pets in our records are older than he is. He's got his whole life ahead of him and is bursting with energy! Enjoy these carefree moments of discovery.

1: seems to hate you. Be careful, or you might be a victim of a bad blow on your adventures!
seems to be unfamiliar with you. Considering how you deal with your pet, this is no surprise!
seems to be in a deep unease. You should try to feed your pet.
2: still seems wild. Take care of your pet and earn its trust!
seems to be unapprehended. If you don't care about your pet, you will never get his love!
doesn't seem to be happy. You should try feeding your pet.
3: still seems a little apprehensive. Take care of your pet and earn its trust!
still seems to be trusting you. Keep caring for your pet to get its love!
seems to be getting started on you. Try feeding your pet regularly.
4: seems to appreciate you. Keep caring for your pet to earn all the trust!
seems to trust you. If you continue along this path, you will soon get all the love of your pet!
seems to have been done to you. Don't stop feeding your pet regularly.
5: seems to fully appreciate you. You don't even need to take care of your pet anymore to keep it loving you!
seems to share a strong link with you. Your link is unbreakable, as long as you aren't separated, you will continue to enjoy your pet's love!

fightReward.title: {emote:fightCommand.gloryChange} Combat rewards
fightReward.noReward: You've used up all your combat rewards, so come back tomorrow.
higherEloWins: {{winner}} imposes itself on the field with a marked performance.
{{loser}} gave everything he had, but {{winner}} showed greater control of his game.
The difference in level between the two players made itself felt in this fight.
{{winner}} demonstrated its expertise by winning this tough encounter.
{{loser}} can be proud of his performance despite the defeat, but {{winner}} is undoubtedly the winner of this fight.
{{loser}} did his best, but was clearly below the level of {{winner}}.
The difference in talent between the two players was decisive in this battle.
{{winner}} showed why he's considered one of the best by winning this match with ease.
{{loser}} can take this defeat as an opportunity to learn and improve for future battles.
lowestEloWins: The most unexpected thing happened in this fight: {{winner}} won against a more experienced opponent.
{{loser}} may have underestimated his opponent, for {{winner}} showed unfailing determination.
Despite the difference in talent, {{winner}} managed to win this match with a solid strategy.
It wasn't an easy match, but {{winner}} proved that he can stand up to the most talented players.
This fight was certainly a turning point in the career of {{winner}}, who demonstrated his determination and ability to beat the most experienced.
{{winner}} overcame expectations to win this tight match against a more talented opponent.
{{loser}} may have underestimated his opponent, for {{winner}} showed unfailing determination.
Despite the difference in levels, {{winner}} managed to win this fight thanks to a clever strategy.
It wasn't an easy match, but {{winner}} proved that he can stand up to the most talented players.
{{winner}} certainly took a significant step forward in his career by winning this difficult match.
draw: The match was a hotly contested duel between two talented players.
{{player1}} and {{player2}} showed unfailing determination throughout the match.
Neither player was able to gain the decisive advantage, resulting in an unexpected tie.
This match will probably go down as one of the tightest and most exciting in history.
{{player1}} and {{player2}} put up a determined fight.
Despite the difference in level, both players gave everything they had to win the match.
Neither could gain the decisive advantage, leading to a surprising tie.
Neither player was able to gain the decisive advantage, resulting in a tie.
This match will probably go down as one of the tightest and most exciting in history.
{{player1}} and {{player2}} both showed why they are considered talented competitors in this epic match.
sameElo: This match was an exciting duel between two players of the same level.
{{player1}} and {{player2}} both delivered solid, balanced performances.
The match was very close, with clever tactics from both sides.
Spectators witnessed an epic match between two talented players on equal terms.
